list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
V2.8.1 + .EXE Wordpress API- Butik 24 | Bug Fix I (guiDesign.py as main.py)
V2.8.1 - "Completed" after local_pickup_sticker.pdf - "Send notifications" button replaced in finisher popup ⬜ Auto print by Accept chrome dialog
V2.7 - Added "processing" orders counter - Added local_pickup_sticker.pdf
V2.6.8 - SpiderSticker_log.txt Added to find Errors.
V2.6.7 - fixed local pickup - buyer notes on popup - error show up when bug comes
V2.6.5 - Chrome driver based field BETA - local pickup sticker pdf BETA
V2.6.4 - Local pickup bug fixes - Butik site update bug fix
V2.6.3 Disable notification button when no needed
V2.6.2 (minor fixes) - popupDesign.py Ready to use for איסוף עצמי ✔ Locker code currently dynamic with config.txt ⬜ Add order left to do (בטיפול) ⬜ Not quit browser if failed - Title change when order is ready
V2.5 Mid version when sms callr in used (Moved to israeli textMeSMS.py)
V2.4 (Beta) when pickup needed, and "No" button is clicked on popup - open new popup of locker selection. (u can try it on order #27695) little messy Version...
V2.31 Selenium window Phone view to fix bugs, more waiting time before SMS confirmation status Beta on tests.py (Coming soon...): ⬜ Selenium & Woo API Start run at same time ⬜ tkinter_tests.py to select locker on איסוף עצמי
V2.23 Fixed complete status & other bugs NEW! customers get Tracking SMS with Link!
V2.1 Wordpress improved time to to Instant using Wordpress Api ✔ Also upgraded 2nd button (send mail) to be based API
V1.4 fix errors (That happen from Butik site changes)
V1.3 Close order by changing to "Complete" when send_track_mail()
V1.2 fix street field & other improvements
V1.1 "Continue" button just works. "Send tracking mail" button just works.
